narratives.c_essay: I'm on a journey to leave behind harmful communities and am here to support others doing the same. With my background in tech and a comfortable income, I've found purpose in helping others recover. My two pit bulls keep me grounded, and despite the pressures of work, I'm committed to this path of recovery and mutual support.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm recovery_0022_54b4f9, a recovery helper focused on supporting others in their journey away from harmful communities. I share resources, celebrate small victories, and offer a shoulder to lean on. Let's navigate this path together!
